name: Freefall (itch) (M1NT_CONDITION_)
description:
A short game made for LD49.

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move and dodge the radiation particles so you can not die.

Credits:

  • Dario (https://m1nt-condition.itch.io/) - Programming
  • Grace Schorno - Programming
  • Katelyn - Art
  • Matthew (https://medow.itch.io/) - Music and Sound

Full Song Link: https://youtu.be/hMVUz6sKQhc
